MAN.TITLE: intdec
MAN.SHORT_DESCRIPTION: Changes sampling rate of a signal

PARAM_ITEM.PARAM_DESCRIPTION: : For a 1D signal this is a scalar which gives the rate change. For a 2D signal this is a 2-Vector of sampling rate changes lom=(col rate change,row rate change)

DESCRIPTION.P: Changes the sampling rate of a 1D or 2D signal by the rates in lom

MAN.AUTHOR: C. B.
